description: Try our easy to follow Chargrilled Cos With Hazelnuts recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: BBQ vegetables,Pescatarian,Halal,Seafood free,Wheat free,Gluten free,Vegetarian,Egg free,Sesame free,Dairy free
name: Chargrilled Cos With Hazelnuts Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Heat a barbecue grill or chargrill pan over medium heat.
Whisk half the oil, juice, mustard and honey together in a small bowl until well combined and set aside.

Remove outer leaves from lettuce and discard. Cut each lettuce into quarters. Drizzle with remaining oil. Cook lettuce for 3-4 minutes on each side or until lightly charred. Transfer to a serving plate.
Drizzle dressing over lettuce and season to taste. Sprinkle with hazelnuts and parmesan. Serve.
